title: The Modern Warrior
desc: The ultimate “utility tool” is a goes-with-you-everywhere custom gun you can rely on day after day.

title: The Deep Concealment
desc: Every concealed-carry upgrade your factory firearm is missing out on. A combat-ready gun build that’s showy on the inside.

title: The Competition
desc: A race-ready custom gun build with real-world applications. Go from 3-gun competition to range day and back.
